reflections,/NN soon/RB fell/VBD asleep./RB CHAPTER/NNP VI./NNP --/: A/DT Rustic/JJ Miser/NNP and/CC His/PRP$ Establishment/NNP There/EX is/VBZ to/TO be/VB found/VBN in/IN Ireland,/NNP and,/CC we/PRP
